Title: Relates to tuition assistance program awards for dual or concurrent enrollment coursework
Summary: Relates to tuition assistance program awards for dual or concurrent enrollment coursework; awards dual or concurrent enrollment program awards for payment annually to school districts in which dual or concurrent enrollment programs are located.
LawCode: Add Art 13-C ยง640, ยง669-i, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to tuition assistance program awards for dual or concurrent enrollment coursework
